mapper.select: select member_id, member_email, member_name, member_nickname, member_phone, member_create_date, member_delete_status from member where member_email=#{memberEmail} and member_password=#{memberPassword}
select member_id, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nickname, member_phone, member_create_date, member_delete_status from member where member_id=#{memberId}
